task.summary: done with department layout and dashboard
reception can now add patients and management can add wards and beds
A lot of stuff today. updating vital signs, adding medical diagnosis with treatment
nurses can complete treatments and doctors can add treatments and cancel treatments
started with pharmacry feature. It's about to go down
Pharmacist can now prescribe medicine for a prescription
pharmacist can now confirm prescriptions and portal can confirm payment. Things are looking good
leave request can now be made
